PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MobileTelecommunicationsApplianceTypeAccessPoint
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsAppliance and types of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsApplianceType with the predefined type set to ACCESSPOINT.

PropertyDef.Name: BandWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the bandwidth for telecommunication of the device.

PropertyDef.Name: DataEncryptionType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of security protocols that can be used in the access point to protect the wireless network.

PropertyDef.Name: DataExchangeRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the data transfer rate of the access point in bit per second (bps).

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfAntennas
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of antennas integrated in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: UserCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the user capacity of the device, defined as the maximum number of users that can be active at the same time.
